text: Carl Andreas August Goos (6 August 1797, Schleswig - 12 July 1855, Schleswig) was a German-Danish painter working in history painting, genre painting and portrait painting. == External links == * Category:1797 births Category:1855 deaths Category:19th-century German painters Category:19th-century Danish painters Category:Danish male painters Category:Danish genre painters Category:German genre painters Category:Danish landscape painters Category:German landscape painters Category:19th-century painters of historical subjects Category:German portrait painters Category:Danish portrait painters Category:People from Schleswig, Schleswig-Holstein Category:19th- century male artists
title: Carl Andreas August Goos
